text: Good morning, how are you doing today?
I'm well....how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks.  Today I am informing people of a charity I work with called Save the Children
Okay...please tell me more.
Save the Children has workers on the ground in over 120 countries helping kids and families with health, education, protection and disaster relief
Sounds like a good charity
As you can imagine, having that many people and offering that much help to people can cost a fair amount.  How much do you spend on coffee/tea/soft drinks per week?
I spend about $10 a week on Coffee
Most people spend that much or more!  Would you be willing to use your payment for this task to donate to Save the Children and forgo a cup of coffee this week?
I would be happy to
Your donation will be used to help kids all over the world
That sounds great
You know your donation will be going to a reputable company.  86% of donations go directly to program services while the remainder goes to fundraising and a small portion to management.
Good to know
Now I need to know how much you would be willing to donate to the cause.  You can give as much or as little as you would like from your payment.
I'll donate the entire amount
That will be so helpful!  Thank you so much for thinking of others
I'm happy to help
Thanks again and have a great day
You as well
